name: WaffleMan
description:
WaffleMan is a fun platformer game where you play as a waffle on a quest to find a sweets jackpot. On you way you encounter rotten sweets, candy cane spikes, sugar lava, sugar rushes, and secrets! Join this adventure now to have fun discovering 10 levels of puzzles and secrets of the candy cave!

Make sure you have unity webplayer instaled.
